titleStmt.title: His Maiesties late commission of array for the county of Middlesex more especially for the cities of London and Westminster. Published to the world for the satisfaction of all good people against the falshood of the rebels, who impudently call this commission a horrid plot, and horrible treason.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare M. DC. XLIII. [1643]

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from Madan.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
